About Us

Bjak is focused on providing access to affordable and sustainable financial services for people in ASEAN. Headquartered in Malaysia, Bjak is the largest insurance portal in Southeast Asia. Our main portal, Bjak.com, helps millions find the insurance policy with the best value and highest coverage for them. Our investments in technology such as Custom API, trading systems and data science is to enable easy access to financial services that were previously inaccessible or difficult to understand.

Lead Engineer, Backend

We are seeking a dedicated and skilled Lead Engineer, with a strong background in backend development to join our team in Indonesia. As a Lead Engineer, you will play a crucial role in shaping our backend architecture, driving technical excellence, and leading a team of talented engineers. Your expertise will contribute to the creation of robust and scalable solutions that power our applications and services.

Responsibilities:

Guide the design, development, and implementation of backend systems, ensuring they align with our architectural goals and industry best practices
Provide mentorship and technical direction to a team of backend engineers, fostering a collaborative and growth-oriented environment
Contribute to the evolution of our backend architecture, focusing on scalability, performance, and security
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration with frontend components and external services
Drive the adoption of coding standards, code reviews, and best practices to ensure high-quality, maintainable code
Implement testing strategies to validate backend functionality and reliability
Analyze and troubleshoot complex technical issues within backend systems, implementing efficient and effective solutions
Optimize backend performance, ensuring smooth user experiences and efficient data processing
Collaborate closely with frontend engineers, product managers, and other stakeholders to deliver cohesive end-to-end solutions
Communicate technical concepts effectively to both technical and non-technical team members

Requirements

MS/BS in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information Technology, or related fields, with a robust foundation in Computer Science fundamentals encompassing algorithms and data structures
A track record of at least 5 years in full-time software engineering. Additional strength is derived from proficiency in C++ and backend development
At least 3 years of hands-on experience in professional engineering management, showcasing your leadership acumen
Proficiency in programming and a profound comprehension of contemporary technologies, encompassing ReactJS/React Native, NodeJS, Kubernetes, GCP, MongoDB, and Docker
Profound experience in managing cloud operations that prioritize reliability, scalability, and security, specifically within the realms of GCP and/or AWS
Demonstrable ownership and commitment, evident in your ability to drive initiatives from their inception to successful completion

Benefits

Fast moving, challenging and unique business problems
Strong learning and development plans for your career growth
International work environment and flat organization

title: Senior Software Engineer - Backend (API)
company_type: See recent hiring trends for VIDA. Upgrade my plan
about_the_job:
Location: Jakarta

About Vida

What are we trying to solve?

We have 7.5 billion people on Earth, of which over 1 billion cannot securely prove their identity right now.

Every year, 140 million babies are born, of which 40 million go unregistered.

Simply put, these people are deprived of social benefits, such as education and health, their civil rights to vote and travel; and are excluded from the economy because they cannot sign up for bank accounts, loans, welfare programs etc. We believe this is unacceptable and needs to change.

At VIDA, We are creating a frictionless digital identity system. One that fulfills the needs and expectations of our times, and is available anywhere, for everyone.

Why are we solving this problem?

The United Nations (UN) and World Bank ID4D initiatives aim to provide everyone on the planet with a legal identity by 2030. This deadline is just 9 years away, we are expecting a digital identity to be a legal human right by then and we at VIDA want to be pioneers in leading this change.

Who are we?

We are a highly driven bunch of people to solve this problem for our own reasons. Whether it is to solve for misleading doctors, or because we didnâ€™t get access to fair ration due to corruption - Our collective goal aligns.

Other things that we care about:
Our mission is to enable trust, so what we do is pretty serious stuff â€“ we work hard and we have audacious goals. We balance it through humor and making sure we have fun at work. We take our work seriously, but we donâ€™t take ourselves too seriously.
We are a startup so at times we will do things that are outside our scope. We do it to learn but we also do it because it takes a village.
We believe feedback is a gift and should be given freely, constructively, and in a respectful manner.
We are accountable to many stakeholders, but first and foremost, we are accountable to our mission and each other

Roles & Responsibilities
Design and develop VIDA Identify suite services.
Fully capable of owning and running entire subsystems of work.
Deep, substantial expertise in multiple programming environments.
Driving technology & best practices in Engineering.
Scaling, Performance, and ensuring High-Availability & Quality of the products;
Driving code reviews, design reviews, and architecture discussions
Experiment with new & relevant technologies and tools, and drive adoption.
Experience in developing distributed data processing, stream or batch, system.
Design and develop logical and physical data models to meet application requirements.
Coordinate with architects, development, DevOps, and product management.

Skills Required
Strong understanding of software design concepts, patterns, tools, and best practices.
Must have full PLC backend engineering experience using SpringBoot, Spring Security, relational databases, or NoSQL databases
5+ years of experience with Java 
Experience with writing code in RxJava or Spring Reactive
Must have significant experience in working with identity verification services such as OCR, demographic APIs, Face Biometric APIs, etc.
Strong knowledge of REST and microservices architecture design.
Significant experience with solutioning on MongoDB and advanced knowledge of any SQL database.
Hands-on experience in federated identity protocols, JWT, JWS, JWE, PKI, and standard symmetric/asymmetric cryptography.
Experience with Serverless frameworks is a plus.
Experience with AWS infrastructure as a code using Terraform is a plus
Background in building containers using docker and deploying using Kubernetes is a plus

Qualifications
Bachelor's/Masterâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or equivalent technical degree. 
Experience working within the Agile Scrum methodology 
Knowledge of data structures, algorithms, and distributed systems. 
Strong focus on clean code and robust design and test-driven development.
Ability to work well with people and be both highly motivated and motivating

Have knowledge and experience of several cloud services such as AWS, GCP, Azure

Non-Technical

Ability to adapt to new tech stack.
Ability to research risk identification and mitigation methods.
Strong written and oral communication
Manage stakeholders along with product teams 

Letâ€™s Realise a Cryptocurrency Bank for Everyone!

We are building the #1 cryptocurrency bank for everyone to accelerate the transition to an open financial system

We have impacted many lives but thereâ€™s still plenty to do and we canâ€™t do it alone. You can learn more about us

What is PINTU?

PINTU is a blockchain-based digital investment app that focuses on new investors. We have created a user-friendly app that helps new investors to learn, buy and invest cryptocurrency one click away.

Our agility and firm hold on our core purpose and values have allowed us to remain resilient and thrive through tumultuous times.

At Hyppies, we're more than just a recruitment company; we're a movement. Inspired by the ethos of hypergrowth and high potential, we're dedicated to matching the most talented individuals with the most ambitious tech companies.
Our name, Hyppies, is a nod to the revolutionary spirit of the hippie movement, reflecting our commitment to challenging the conventional approach to tech recruitment.

Our Vision
We envision a world where the right talent meets the right opportunity, creating a synergy that fuels innovation and growth in the tech sector. We believe in the power of people and their potential to transform industries, and we're here to make those connections happen.

Our Services
Recruitment : We specialize in identifying high-potential talent for roles that demand innovation and expertise. Our extensive network across the tech industry enables us to find the perfect match for both companies and candidates.

Contracting: Recognizing the need for flexibility in the fast-paced tech world, we offer staffing solutions for short-term and project-based needs.

Large-Scale Recruitment Projects: Hyppies offers streamlined, high-quality recruitment solutions for companies facing rapid expansion and large-scale hiring needs.

Offshoring: We specialize in establishing efficient offshore teams, connecting you with a global talent pool to enhance diversity and optimize costs.

Market Insights: With our finger on the pulse of Asia's tech scene, we offer valuable insights into market trends, helping companies and professionals stay ahead of the curve.

Our Presence
Headquartered in Singapore, Hyppies operates across Asia with additional offices in Malaysia and Indonesia. This strategic presence allows us to tap into diverse talent pools and offer region-specific market expertise.

Our Culture
We're proud to embody the spirit of non-conformity and freedom that marked the hippie movement. At Hyppies, creativity and out-of-the-box thinking are at the core of what we do.

title: Dev Ops Engineer
company_type: 51-200 employees Â· Telecommunications
company_description: PT FIRST WAP INTERNATIONAL (brand name 1rstWAP) provides advanced mobile messaging, location based solutions and other services to mobile operators, the enterprise market and government institutions around the world.
about_the_job:
Is software system implementation your  passion ?

Are you keen on managing a system or operating system?

Are you able to  solve a problem  in a short time and with an effective method?

If all of your answers to the points above are YES, then you are the one we are looking for!

As a DevOps Engineer, you will be under the supervision of the DevOps Manager. Your tasks consist of prepare, deploy, set-up, and maintain our products/system applications on the staging and the production environments  around the world . 

Responsibilities

Set-up and maintain the staging environments,
Build and package the system applications,
Write documents about system architectures, pre-deployment preparations, deployment instructions, system configurations, and post-deployment guidelines from DevOps and Deployment Engineersâ€™ point-of-view,
Deploy system applications on the staging and the production environments,
Ensure all the system applications are working as expected from the front-end to the back-end,
Provide support for production deployment on-site,
Resolve all the reported issues/customer complaints/incidents/bugs within the Service Level Agreement (SLA) and write wiki pages on how to resolve them as the knowledge-base,
Report planning and progress of tasks, deployments, and resolutions to the DevOps Manager,
If needed, participate in internal meetings, workshops, and presentations,
If needed, participate in meetings with partners and clients,
If needed, give training and knowledge sharing sessions,
Keep the integrity of the workplace (no downloads, no private code or data, et cetera).

Requirements

Fluent in verbal and written English is a MUST,
Keen with Bash scripting or Python programming language,
Deep understanding of application monitoring, logging and alerting systems,
Preferable experience with automation tools,
Experience with Git version control system,
Understanding of TCP/IP and SCTP/IP stack and related protocols,
Minimum 1 year of experience in System Administration or Operations,
Deep know-how with Linux operating system (Ubuntu, CentOS, etcetera),
Experience with MySQL or NoSQL database,
Track record with virtualized or containerized environments,
Ability to learn and use a wide variety of open source technologies and tools,
Good communicator, problem solver, and planning attitudes,
Can work independently and as part of a team.

We Offer

 A competitive remuneration package with social benefits,
 Additional family health insurance,
 Training and professional development,
 Career path in a rapidly growing company,
 Skilled co-workers to share experience with,
 A friendly and non-conflict working environment,
 Retirement Plan.

A fast-growing company that is developing a multifunctional cryptocurrency app that is directly connected with Telegram, a messaging platform with over 2.5 million users, is looking for a Senior Full-Stack Engineer. The engineer will be working with a very knowledgeable team with extensive experience in both the regular world and cryptocurrency. The company provides wallet custodians exchange, sends assets on Telegram and on-chain, and offers self-custodial and on-ramp features on behalf of customers. This is an amazing opportunity for candidates who are eager to work within a dynamic startup environment while juggling competing responsibilities.

Job Responsibilities:

Work in a startup setting with a lot of autonomy 
Come up with and test out fresh concepts to effectively enhance the service
Write scalable, efficient, high-availability, low-latency code
Build highly scalable distributed solutions utilizing the entire stack to promote measurable business development and satisfying user experiences

Job Requirements:

Bachelorâ€™s/Masterâ€™s degree in Engineering, Computer Science (or equivalent experience)
At least 3+ years of relevant experience as a full-stack engineer
Extensive experience working with Python, React, and TypeScript
Familiarity with FastAPI, PostgreSQL, and Web3
Prior experience independently developing at least medium-sized features
Needs to be focused on the product and the customer
Ability to quickly put together MVPs and develop semi-sophisticated systems
Excellent English communication skills, both spoken and written
